data.context: A 500 ml reactor equipped with mechanical stirrer, thermometer and condenser was loaded with 280 ml of acetonitrile, 71 g of 2-amino-4,5,6,7-tetrahydro-benzothiazole-6-carboxylic acid ethyl ester [(III), R1=ethyl] and 38.75 g of acetic anhydride. 38.03 g of triethylamine were dropwise added to the resulting suspension in about 10 minutes.
